struct Entry {
    int key;
    int count;
    struct Entry* next;
};

#define TABLE_SIZE 10007

struct Entry* hash_table[TABLE_SIZE];

void init_hash() {
    for (int i =0; i < TABLE_SIZE; i++) {
        hash_table[i] = NULL;
    }
}

void add_entry(int key) {
    int hash = (key % TABLE_SIZE + TABLE_SIZE) % TABLE_SIZE; // handle negatives
    struct Entry* entry = hash_table[hash];
    while (entry != NULL) {
        if (entry->key == key) {
            entry->count++;
            return;
        }
        entry = entry->next;
    }
    // Not found, add new entry
    struct Entry* new_entry = (struct Entry*)malloc(sizeof(struct Entry));
    new_entry->key = key;
    new_entry->count =1;
    new_entry->next = hash_table[hash];
    hash_table[hash] = new_entry;
}

int get_count(int key) {
    int hash = (key % TABLE_SIZE + TABLE_SIZE) % TABLE_SIZE;
    struct Entry* entry = hash_table[hash];
    while (entry != NULL) {
        if (entry->key == key) {
            return entry->count;
        }
        entry = entry->next;
    }
    return 0; // shouldn't happen if properly counted
}

void free_hash() {
    for (int i=0; i < TABLE_SIZE; i++) {
        struct Entry* entry = hash_table[i];
        while (entry != NULL) {
            struct Entry* next = entry->next;
            free(entry);
            entry = next;
        }
    }
}

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>

#define mod 1000000007
#define TABLE_SIZE 10007

struct Entry {
    int key;
    int count;
    struct Entry* next;
};

struct Entry* hash_table[TABLE_SIZE];

void init_hash() {
    for (int i =0; i < TABLE_SIZE; i++) {
        hash_table[i] = NULL;
    }
}

void add_entry(int key) {
    int hash = (key % TABLE_SIZE + TABLE_SIZE) % TABLE_SIZE;
    struct Entry* entry = hash_table[hash];
    while (entry != NULL) {
        if (entry->key == key) {
            entry->count++;
            return;
        }
        entry = entry->next;
    }
    struct Entry* new_entry = (struct Entry*)malloc(sizeof(struct Entry));
    new_entry->key = key;
    new_entry->count =1;
    new_entry->next = hash_table[hash];
    hash_table[hash] = new_entry;
}

int compute_second_term() {
    int total =0;
    for (int i=0; i < TABLE_SIZE; i++) {
        struct Entry* entry = hash_table[i];
        while (entry != NULL) {
            int cnt = entry->count;
            total += cnt * (cnt +1)/2;
            entry = entry->next;
        }
    }
    return total;
}

void free_hash() {
    for (int i=0; i < TABLE_SIZE; i++) {
        struct Entry* entry = hash_table[i];
        while (entry != NULL) {
            struct Entry* next = entry->next;
            free(entry);
            entry = next;
        }
    }
}

    for (int i=0; i <n; i++) {
        total_sum += (n -i);
    }

    // Initialize hash table and compute frequencies
    init_hash();
    for (int i=0; i <n; i++) {
        add_entry(arr[i]);
    }

    // Convert res to string for File 2

        }

    long long file2_result = (dp[n_str][0] + dp[n_str][1]) % mod;
